    • addMeasurement

      public boolean addMeasurement​(double d, java.time.LocalDateTime ldt, java.lang.String string) throws edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException, edu.ma02.core.exceptions.MeasurementException
      Adds a new measurement
      Specified by:
      addMeasurement in interface edu.ma02.core.interfaces.ISensor
      Parameters:
      d - The measurement value
      ldt - The measurement date
      string - The measurement unit
      Returns:
      true if the measurement was correctly added otherwise false
      Throws:
      edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException - if the @param unit is not compatible with the unit pre-defined for the sensor
      edu.ma02.core.exceptions.MeasurementException - if the value is -99 or any parameter is invalid
